successDialog.description: The details of your building have been successfully uploaded and are now part of the growing tapestry of our community's history. By sharing these stories, you help keep the past alive for future generations to learn from and appreciate.

description:
Welcome to Heritage Builder, a platform dedicated to preserving the architectural heritage of Central Europe. Whether you're an amateur historian, a passionate local, or a seasoned architect, you can create articles about the old buildings that shape our cities, towns, and landscapes—each one a testament to the history and traditions of our ancestors. 
 Share your knowledge, discover stories from fellow enthusiasts, rate the articles you find inspiring, and engage in meaningful discussions that celebrate our cultural legacy. 
 Join us on Heritage Builder, where we honor the timeless beauty of our old buildings and foster a deep sense of pride and patriotism for the traditions that continue to define us.
